title: Baby Dress Up
description: Baby Dress Up is a fun game to experience the joy of caring for a cute baby. Show off your sense of fashion by dressing up adorable baby dolls. With a wide variety of baby doll clothes and accessories, you'll have full control over the baby's appearance. Change diapers, select costumes, and play with toys to keep the bundle of joy happy. Capture fashionable moments with screenshots and share them with friends.
